name: Tree of Knowledge
description:
Climb a randomly generated tree and survive as long as possible. Instead of battling monsters, you battle a couple of thousands different quiz questions in over a 100 different categories. On your way to the top you have the chance of attaining various effects and artifacts, which may help or hinder your progress. Every time you die you gain XP and level up, which unlocks additional skills to help you on your trivia adventure.

FEATURES:

  • Over 3000 different quiz questions divided into over a hundred different categories.
  • A RPG leveling system where you unlock a diverse set of skills which will help you in your climb to the top.
  • Obtain powerful artifacts which impacts your game and makes every climb different.

THE GAME IS IN AN EARLY STAGE AND FILLED WITH BUGS
